sentences.sContent: The story of American Exploration begins with a Viking called "Erik the Red".
sentences.sContent_eng: The story of American Exploration begins with a Viking called "Erik the Red".
sentences.sCn: 美洲探险的传奇始于一个名叫“红色埃里克”的维京海盗。

sentences.sContent: By the middle of 9th century, the Viking and the Danes were posing a threat to the Saxon kingdom of Wessex.
sentences.sContent_eng: By the middle of 9th century, the Viking and the Danes were posing a threat to the Saxon kingdom of Wessex.
sentences.sCn: 到9世纪中叶，北欧海盗和丹麦人威胁到撒克逊人的威撒克斯王国的安全。

trans.tranOther: a member of the group of Scandinavian people who sailed in ships to attack areas along the coasts of northern and western Europe from the 8th to 11th centuries
